Posts.Content: Oct 17, 2007 07:52PM boughtonl wrote: Anne, I just had a bilateral on Sept. 26. I tried to drive the other day, but it hurt when I turned the steering wheel because I had a lymph node taken out under both arms. I am the kind of person that needs to keep busy so it is very hard for me. I have been reading and crocheting a lot.
Posts.Title: Getting ready for my surgery AnneW CarolC
